dmca.title: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2007 10:35 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.

 

This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. Please see the
attached letter concerning the sale of counterfeit Rolex merchandise.

 

Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP

www.gibney.com <http://www.gibney.com/> 

 

 

IRS CIRCULAR 230 NOTICE: IRS CIRCULAR 230 REQUIRES THAT WE ADVISE YOU
THAT ANY U.S. FEDERAL TAX ADVICE CONTAINED IN THIS COMMUNICATION OR IN
ANY ATTACHMENT HERETO IS NOT INTENDED OR WRITTEN TO BE USED, AND CANNOT
BE USED, FOR PURPOSE OF (I) AVOIDING PENALTIES UNDER THE INTERNAL
REVENUE CODE OR (II) PROMOTING, MARKETING OR RECOMMENDING TO ANOTHER
PARTY ANY TRANSACTION OR MATTER ADDRESSED HEREIN.
This message is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to
which it is addressed, and may contain information that is privileged
confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the
reader of this message is not the intended recipient, or the employee or
agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient,
you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying
of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this
communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone, and
delete this message from your system. Thank you.

--------------

April 25, 2007 BY EMAIL: copyright@theplanet.com AND FIRST CLASS MAIL ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 ATTN: Andrea Almeida RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A.,INC. Dear Ms. Almeida: This firmis general counsel toRolex WatchU.S.A. Inc. (
